2024 年 7 月 18 日星期四 16:01:49 +0000 TED 每日演讲（标清视频） https://www.ted.com/talks TED - TED.com TED 是一个致力于传播值得传播的想法的非营利组织。在此视频中，您将看到一些世界领先的思想家和实干家在 TED 会议、TEDx 活动和世界各地合作伙伴活动的舞台上发表演讲，激发、激发和激发他们的想象力。该播客还提供高清视频和纯音频格式。 TED 会议上值得传播的想法泰德TED 是一个致力于传播值得传播的想法的非营利组织。在此视频中，您将看到一些世界领先的思想家和实干家在 TED 会议、TEDx 活动和世界各地合作伙伴活动的舞台上发表演讲，激发、激发和激发他们的想象力。该播客还提供高清视频和纯音频格式。 zh知识共享：https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/4.0/泰德contact@ted.com https://pl.tedcdn.com/rss_feed_images/ted_talks_main_podcast/video.png TED 每日演讲（标清视频） https://www.ted.com/talks 144 144 科学技术娱乐设计 TED、TEDTalks、TED 演讲、灵感、创造力、技术演示、教育不非成人的
如何宣称你的领导力 |迈克尔·蒂姆斯迈克尔·蒂姆斯When faced with challenges, do you often seek someone else to blame? Leadership expert Michael Timms shows why this instinct is counterproductive, highlighting three effective habits of self-accountability that will empower you and others to make positive change — whether at home or at work.如何宣称你的领导力 |迈克尔·蒂姆斯When faced with challenges, do you often seek someone else to blame? Leadership expert Michael Timms shows why this instinct is counterproductive, highlighting three effective habits of self-accountability that will empower you and others to make positive change — whether at home or at work. https://www.ted.com/talks/michael_timms_how_to_claim_your_leadership_power_jul_2024?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:134129 134129 Thu, 18 Jul 2024 15:06:41 +0000高等教育不00:11:22泰德
为什么年轻人的境况比他们的父母更糟糕——以及对此该怎么办？斯科特·加洛韦斯科特·加洛韦In this special conversation, NYU marketing professor Scott Galloway and head of TED Chris Anderson dive deeper into Galloway’s explosive recent TED Talk, which has been seen by millions and ignited conversations about what he calls “the great intergenerational theft,” or how older generations are stealing prosperity from the young. With razor-sharp insights on the skyrocketing cost of housing, the mental health crisis created by social media, reckless government spending and more, Galloway explores bold solutions to the most pressing issues facing young people — and delivers a few spectacular rants along the way. (If you’ve already seen Galloway's TED Talk, skip ahead to 20:25.)为什么年轻人的境况比他们的父母更糟糕——以及对此该怎么办？斯科特·加洛韦In this special conversation, NYU marketing professor Scott Galloway and head of TED Chris Anderson dive deeper into Galloway’s explosive recent TED Talk, which has been seen by millions and ignited conversations about what he calls “the great intergenerational theft,” or how older generations are stealing prosperity from the young. With razor-sharp insights on the skyrocketing cost of housing, the mental health crisis created by social media, reckless government spending and more, Galloway explores bold solutions to the most pressing issues facing young people — and delivers a few spectacular rants along the way. (If you’ve already seen Galloway's TED Talk, skip ahead to 20:25.) https://www.ted.com/talks/scott_galloway_why_young_people_are_worse_off_than_their_parents_and_what_to_do_about_it?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:134516 134516 Thu, 18 Jul 2024 15:04:46 +0000高等教育不00:56:10泰德
量子计算机不是你想象的那样——它们更酷 |哈特穆特·内文哈特穆特·内文Quantum computers obtain superpowers by tapping into parallel universes, says Hartmut Neven, the founder and lead of Google Quantum AI. He explains how this emerging tech can far surpass traditional computers by relying on quantum physics rather than binary logic, and shares a roadmap to build the ultimate quantum computer. Learn how this fascinating and powerful tech can help humanity take on seemingly unsolvable problems in medicine, sustainable energy, AI, neuroscience and more.量子计算机不是你想象的那样——它们更酷 |哈特穆特·内文Quantum computers obtain superpowers by tapping into parallel universes, says Hartmut Neven, the founder and lead of Google Quantum AI. He explains how this emerging tech can far surpass traditional computers by relying on quantum physics rather than binary logic, and shares a roadmap to build the ultimate quantum computer. Learn how this fascinating and powerful tech can help humanity take on seemingly unsolvable problems in medicine, sustainable energy, AI, neuroscience and more. https://www.ted.com/talks/hartmut_neven_quantum_computers_aren_t_what_you_think_they_re_cooler?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:134650 134650 Wed, 17 Jul 2024 15:32:34 +0000高等教育不00:11:35泰德
清洁能源转型中缺失的一环|希拉·恩戈齐·奥帕拉奥查希拉·恩戈齐·奥帕拉奥查The clean energy transition has a major blind spot, says energy equity expert Sheila Ngozi Oparaocha: it ignores millions of people without access to energy. Highlighting grassroots women's organizations leading the charge towards universal access, she makes a powerful call to prioritize gender equality in energy policies — and to create a sustainable future where no one is left in the dark.清洁能源转型中缺失的一环|希拉·恩戈齐·奥帕拉奥查The clean energy transition has a major blind spot, says energy equity expert Sheila Ngozi Oparaocha: it ignores millions of people without access to energy. Highlighting grassroots women's organizations leading the charge towards universal access, she makes a powerful call to prioritize gender equality in energy policies — and to create a sustainable future where no one is left in the dark. https://www.ted.com/talks/sheila_ngozi_oparaocha_the_missing_piece_of_the_clean_energy_transition?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:134417 134417 Tue, 16 Jul 2024 14:58:08 +0000高等教育不00:09:57泰德
特朗普遇刺事件后，美国能否团结起来？ |伊恩·布雷默伊恩·布雷默In this urgent conversation, president and founder of Eurasia Group and GZERO Media Ian Bremmer joins TED’s Helen Walters to discuss the assassination attempt on former President Donald Trump and its profound implications for American politics and democracy. Listen for the latest on the shooting’s political ramifications, the heightened polarization and disinformation in the US electoral cycle and answers to broader questions about leadership and unity in a divided nation. 特朗普遇刺事件后，美国能否团结起来？ |伊恩·布雷默In this urgent conversation, president and founder of Eurasia Group and GZERO Media Ian Bremmer joins TED’s Helen Walters to discuss the assassination attempt on former President Donald Trump and its profound implications for American politics and democracy. Listen for the latest on the shooting’s political ramifications, the heightened polarization and disinformation in the US electoral cycle and answers to broader questions about leadership and unity in a divided nation. https://www.ted.com/talks/ian_bremmer_can_america_come_together_after_the_trump_assassination_attempt?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:134555 134555 Mon, 15 Jul 2024 20:52:25 +0000高等教育不00:36:24泰德
我寻找外星人存在的证据|阿维·勒布阿维·勒布Why have we not yet found proof of alien life? According to astrophysicist Avi Loeb, we simply haven't dedicated the proper resources. Diving into unidentified phenomena such as the Oumuamua asteroid, he explores his scientific search for extraterrestrial technology, envisioning a future where a higher interstellar intelligence helps us improve life here on Earth.我寻找外星人存在的证据|阿维·勒布Why have we not yet found proof of alien life? According to astrophysicist Avi Loeb, we simply haven't dedicated the proper resources. Diving into unidentified phenomena such as the Oumuamua asteroid, he explores his scientific search for extraterrestrial technology, envisioning a future where a higher interstellar intelligence helps us improve life here on Earth. https://www.ted.com/talks/avi_loeb_my_search_for_proof_aliens_exist?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:133970 133970 Mon, 15 Jul 2024 14:59:07 +0000高等教育不00:18:03泰德
得罪了别人怎么办 |兰伯斯·费舍尔兰伯斯·费舍尔Misunderstandings between you and your loved ones will happen — it's what you do next that matters most, says marriage and family therapist Lambers Fisher. Drawing on his work helping couples and relatives work through communication issues, he shares four principles to accept the inevitability of offending someone close to you — and how to use these moments to build trust and empathy.得罪了别人怎么办 |兰伯斯·费舍尔Misunderstandings between you and your loved ones will happen — it's what you do next that matters most, says marriage and family therapist Lambers Fisher. Drawing on his work helping couples and relatives work through communication issues, he shares four principles to accept the inevitability of offending someone close to you — and how to use these moments to build trust and empathy. https://www.ted.com/talks/lambers_fisher_what_to_do_when_you_offend_someone?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:132679 132679 Fri, 12 Jul 2024 14:37:57 +0000高等教育不00:12:08泰德
流行音乐的炼金术 |克莎克莎"You can write a song and you can not tell the truth, but your song will suck," says pop star Kesha. So what's the secret to making a great pop song? She explains the special alchemy of her own hits like "TiK ToK" and "Praying" and gives a stunning debut performance of her new song, "Cathedral." (Note: This talk contains mature language.)流行音乐的炼金术 |克莎"You can write a song and you can not tell the truth, but your song will suck," says pop star Kesha. (Note: This talk contains mature language.) https://www.ted.com/talks/kesha_the_alchemy_of_pop?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:131533 131533 Thu, 11 Jul 2024 14:46:40 +0000高等教育不00:12:22泰德
跨越政治鸿沟进行沟通的 3 个想法 |艾萨克·索尔艾萨克·索尔How does language shape our politics? Journalist Isaac Saul explores how subtle word choices can inhibit productive dialogue about significant issues — and shows how small (but important) changes can help us all have better conversations with people who think differently than us.跨越政治鸿沟进行沟通的 3 个想法 |艾萨克·索尔How does language shape our politics? Journalist Isaac Saul explores how subtle word choices can inhibit productive dialogue about significant issues — and shows how small (but important) changes can help us all have better conversations with people who think differently than us. https://www.ted.com/talks/isaac_saul_3_ideas_for_communicating_across_the_political_divide?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:133464 133464 Thu, 11 Jul 2024 14:46:23 +0000高等教育不00:12:29泰德
为绿色能源而争夺矿物——以及更好的前进之路|萨利姆·阿里萨利姆·阿里To transition to clean energy and green technology like electric cars, the world needs massive amounts of essential minerals. Environmental peacemaker Saleem Ali explains the conflicts already arising between countries rushing to mine and extract these precious minerals — and shows how the world can find a way to cooperate rather than fight resource wars.为绿色能源而争夺矿物——以及更好的前进之路|萨利姆·阿里To transition to clean energy and green technology like electric cars, the world needs massive amounts of essential minerals. Environmental peacemaker Saleem Ali explains the conflicts already arising between countries rushing to mine and extract these precious minerals — and shows how the world can find a way to cooperate rather than fight resource wars. https://www.ted.com/talks/saleem_ali_the_fight_over_minerals_for_green_energy_and_a_better_way_forward?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:133752 133752 Wed, 10 Jul 2024 14:47:02 +0000高等教育不00:12:07泰德
连接数字世界和物理世界的人工智能 |阿尼玛·阿南德库玛阿尼玛·阿南德库玛"While language models may help generate new ideas, they cannot attack the hard part of science, which is simulating the necessary physics," says AI professor Anima Anandkumar. She explains how her team developed neural operators — AI trained on the finest details of the real world — to bridge this gap, sharing recent projects ranging from improved weather forecasting to cutting-edge medical device design that demonstrate the power of AI with universal physical understanding.连接数字世界和物理世界的人工智能 |阿尼玛·阿南德库玛"While language models may help generate new ideas, they cannot attack the hard part of science, which is simulating the necessary physics," says AI professor Anima Anandkumar. She explains how her team developed neural operators — AI trained on the finest details of the real world — to bridge this gap, sharing recent projects ranging from improved weather forecasting to cutting-edge medical device design that demonstrate the power of AI with universal physical understanding. https://www.ted.com/talks/anima_anandkumar_ai_that_connects_the_digital_and_physical_worlds?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:133759 133759 Tue, 09 Jul 2024 14:39:12 +0000高等教育不00:09:50泰德
